description: SQL injection vulnerability in mojoClassified.cgi in MojoPersonals allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the cat parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-3403

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in guestbook.js.php in MJGuest 6.8 GT allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the link parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-3404

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in index.php in Ricardo Amaral nzFotolog 0.4.1 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files via directory traversal sequences in the action_file parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-3405

description: SQL injection vulnerability in showcat.php in phpLinkat 0.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the catid parameter.

description: phpLinkat 0.1 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication and access unspecified pages under admin/ by sending a login=right cookie.

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in CoolPlayer 2.18, and possibly other versions, allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted m3u file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-3408

description: Buffer overflow in Unreal Tournament 3 1.3beta4 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and daemon crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a UDP packet containing a large value in a certain size field, followed by a data string of that size, aka attack 1 in ut3mendo.c.
